      • parse

        public static long parse​(java.lang.String string,
                         long invalid)
        Yes, it turns out that Long.parseLong(String) is a major hotspot due to the fact that it throws a NumberFormatException instead of returning a signal value.
        Returns:
        An integer value or the specified invalid value if the string is not a valid integer

      • parseHex

        public static long parseHex​(java.lang.String text)
        Returns:
        The given hexadecimal value in text as a long

      • parseNaturalNumber

        public static long parseNaturalNumber​(java.lang.String string)
        Yes, it turns out that Integer.parseInt(String) is a major hotspot due to the fact that it throws a NumberFormatException instead of returning a signal value.
        Returns:
        A natural number for the string or -1 if the string is not a natural number

      • searchWords

        public static boolean searchWords​(long value,
                                  int bits,
                                  int searchFor)
        Parameters:
        value - The value to search
        bits - The word length
        searchFor - The value to locate
        Returns:
        True if the value contains the search term in the words
